A presidential welcome

• President Trump personally greeted the three Americans who were released by North Korea on Wednesday, after they arrived back in the U.S. overnight.
The return of the men, all U.S. citizens of Korean descent, removed a delicate obstacle as Mr. Trump prepares for a summit meeting with the North’s leader, Kim Jong-un.
• Mr. Trump was asked on Wednesday if he thought he deserved the Nobel Peace Prize.

“The prize I want is victory for the world.”

Torture era is over, C.I.A.
